Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed business requirements for the analytics project, including data sources, expected outcomes, and performance metrics.
Design the data architecture for Azure Synapse Analytics, including data ingestion, transformation, storage, and visualization layers.
Create and configure an Azure Synapse Analytics workspace in the Azure portal.
Set up virtual networks, private endpoints, and firewall rules to secure the Synapse workspace. Enable encryption for data at rest and in transit.
Connect Azure Synapse Analytics to various data sources, such as Azure Data Lake, SQL databases, or external systems.
Create and configure data pipelines for data ingestion, transformation, and loading using Synapse Pipelines.
Apply security best practices, such as role-based access control (RBAC), managed identities, and auditing. Enable Azure Defender for SQL if applicable.
Configure workload management, caching, and partitioning to optimize the performance of the Synapse Analytics environment.
Configure monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and Synapse Studio to track performance, usage, and errors.
Perform end-to-end testing of the Synapse Analytics environment, including data ingestion, transformation, and visualization workflows.
Develop and deploy analytics solutions, such as dashboards, reports, and machine learning models, using Synapse Studio and integrated tools.
Document the Synapse Analytics architecture, configurations, and operational procedures for future reference and training.
Provide training sessions for the operations and analytics teams on using and managing the Synapse Analytics environment.
Define and implement data governance policies, including data classification, retention, and access control.
Schedule and perform regular maintenance tasks, such as updating configurations, reviewing security settings, and optimizing performance.
